Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Miss Ayla? Miss Ayla... are you there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "She appears to be online in the channel, but there's some weird noise... Could it be...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, could you give us her coordinates?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, there's a record on the radar...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Miss Ayla's signal came from a disconnected compartment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'She was... fighting... against a Corrupted signal... No...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "No wonder we didn't see them. They must be after something else.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the airtight valve of a compartment is blast open, a black, giant silhouette jumps out of the opening—'}
{3: 'Falling rapidly toward the ring where Gray Raven is located...'}
{3: 'A dark shadow lands, creating a huge impact...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'It is a mechanoid in a heavy coat, wearing a bowler hat.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Liv and Lee's probing shots are all deflected by the heavy coat made with special material."}
{3: 'However, the target takes no action. Instead, it just stands there, calmly staring at Lucia.'}
{3: 'Just when Watanabe and Lucia are about to attack—'}
{3: 'Ayla descends from above, her giant scythe slashing down—'}
{3: 'Gabriel lifts his arm and blocks the heavy strike with ease.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After his coat is lift up, it turns out that his other hand—'}
{3: 'Was holding the incomplete carcass of a Construct...'}
{3: 'Ayla draws her scythe back and quickly adjusts her form. She then stomps on the ground and charges straight toward Gabriel...'}
{1: '1', 3: "Gabriel moves his giant body, barely evading Ayla's attacks. However, he does not seem to be willing to engage...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He looks at Lucia one last time... And jumps onto a floating platform nearby.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without any hesitation, Ayla pulls her scythe back as she is about to take off...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Your mission is of higher priority... But I will never let him get away...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Ayla smiles at Liv, then takes a couple of steps before launching herself into the air—', 4: '1'}
{3: "She then continues going after Gabriel's direction..."}
